divs: Sighting Details(English) In a starry sky, there was only one cloud on the right side of my house (I always dedicate it to see heaven, because I have several experiences with this phenomenon) and did not pay much importance and enter my home, take a jar and went back the yard of my house and look again at the sky (in the jar I get delayed more than 6 seconds) and had a cloud over my house with an odd shape and look towards the direction of the other cloud, and it was still ayi , there was not any wind, there were no clouds, I began to look very well in several directions to see if there were more clouds and not only that was on my house and the previously mentioned, again there was no wind and the cloud was proportion of spongy, fill the jar with water and went back to my house, but went back outside to see clouds again, and I do not take more than 10 seconds or less and the cloud was over my house was not, and the other cloud ayi It was still the same. - There was no wind "The sky was starry -the movement of the cloud were not always in the same place - There was not much light pollution (which I really appreciate this) -Camara had no hand -Grave with my cellphone, but could not see anything (the low quality of my cell) "My reaction to this was utter amazement, as the cloud disappeared very fast and very fast, and there was no wind and there were no clouds, if the cloud disappeared, the other deveria have done the same. (Espa���ol) En un cielo estrellado , solo habia una nube al lado derecho de mi casa ( siempre me dedico a ver el cielo , ya que tengo varias experiencias con este fenomeno ) y no le preste mucha importancia y entre a mi hogar , saque un jarro y volvi al patio de mi casa y mire nuevamente al cielo ( en sacar el jarro no me demore mas de 6 segundos ) y habia una nube arriba de mi casa con una forma extra���a y mire hacia la direccion de la otra nube , y aun seguia ayi mismo , no habia viento alguno , no habian mas nubes , me dedique a mirar muy bien en varias direcciones a ver si habian mas nubes y no , solamente la que estaba encima de mi casa y la anteriormente nombrada , repito no habia viento y la nube era de proporcion esponjosa , llene el jarro con agua y volvi a mi casa , pero volvi a salir para volver a ver las nubes , y eso no me tomo mas de 10 segundos o menos , y La nube que estaba encima de mi casa NO ESTABA , y la otra nube Aun seguia ayi mismo . - No habia viento -El cielo era estrellado -los movimientos de la nube : No tenia Siempre en el mismo lugar - no habia Mucha contaminacion luminica ( cosa que pude apreciar bien esto) -Camara no tenia a mano -Grave con mi celular , pero no se podia apreciar nada ( la baja calidad de mi celular ) -Mi reaccion a esto fue de completo asombro , ya que la nube desaparecio muy rapido y se formo muy rapido , y no habia viento y no habian mas nubes , y si desaparecio una nube , la otra deveria haber hecho lo mismo .
